speaker: ELBOW
text: Come, bring them away. If these

speaker: ELBOW
text: be good people in a commonweal that do nothing

speaker: ELBOW
text: but use their abuses in common houses, I know no

speaker: ELBOW
text: law. Bring them away.

speaker: ANGELO
text: How now, sir, what’s your name? And what’s

speaker: ANGELO
text: the matter?

speaker: ELBOW
text: If it please your Honor, I am the poor duke’s

speaker: ELBOW
text: constable, and my name is Elbow. I do lean upon

speaker: ELBOW
text: justice, sir, and do bring in here before your good

speaker: ELBOW
text: Honor two notorious benefactors.

speaker: ANGELO
text: Benefactors? Well, what benefactors are they?

speaker: ANGELO
text: Are they not malefactors?

speaker: ELBOW
text: If it please your Honor, I know not well what

speaker: ELBOW
text: they are, but precise villains they are, that I am sure

speaker: ELBOW
text: of, and void of all profanation in the world that

speaker: ELBOW
text: good Christians ought to have.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: This comes off well. Here’s a wise

speaker: ESCALUS
text: officer.

speaker: ANGELO
text: Go to. What quality are they of?

speaker: ANGELO
text: Elbow is your name? Why dost thou not speak,

speaker: ANGELO
text: Elbow?

speaker: POMPEY
text: He cannot, sir. He’s out at elbow.

speaker: ANGELO
text: What are you, sir?

speaker: ELBOW
text: He, sir? A tapster, sir, parcel bawd; one that

speaker: ELBOW
text: serves a bad woman, whose house, sir, was, as they

speaker: ELBOW
text: say, plucked down in the suburbs, and now she

speaker: ELBOW
text: professes a hothouse, which I think is a very ill

speaker: ELBOW
text: house too.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: How know you that?

speaker: ELBOW
text: My wife, sir, whom I detest before heaven and

speaker: ELBOW
text: your Honor—

speaker: ESCALUS
text: How? Thy wife?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Ay, sir, whom I thank heaven is an honest

speaker: ELBOW
text: woman—

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Dost thou detest her therefore?

speaker: ELBOW
text: I say, sir, I will detest myself also, as well as she,

speaker: ELBOW
text: that this house, if it be not a bawd’s house, it is pity

speaker: ELBOW
text: of her life, for it is a naughty house.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: How dost thou know that, constable?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Marry, sir, by my wife, who, if she had been a

speaker: ELBOW
text: woman cardinally given, might have been accused

speaker: ELBOW
text: in fornication, adultery, and all uncleanliness

speaker: ELBOW
text: there.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: By the woman’s means?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Ay, sir, by Mistress Overdone’s means; but as

speaker: ELBOW
text: she spit in his face, so she defied him.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, if it please your Honor, this is

speaker: POMPEY
text: not so.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Prove it before these varlets here, thou honorable

speaker: ELBOW
text: man, prove it.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Do you hear how he misplaces?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, she came in great with child, and longing,

speaker: POMPEY
text: saving your Honor’s reverence, for stewed prunes.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, we had but two in the house, which at that very

speaker: POMPEY
text: distant time stood, as it were, in a fruit dish, a dish

speaker: POMPEY
text: of some threepence; your Honors have seen such

speaker: POMPEY
text: dishes; they are not china dishes, but very good

speaker: POMPEY
text: dishes—

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Go to, go to. No matter for the dish, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text: No, indeed, sir, not of a pin; you are therein in

speaker: POMPEY
text: the right. But to the point: as I say, this Mistress

speaker: POMPEY
text: Elbow, being, as I say, with child, and being great-bellied,

speaker: POMPEY
text: and longing, as I said, for prunes; and

speaker: POMPEY
text: having but two in the dish, as I said, Master Froth

speaker: POMPEY
text: here, this very man, having eaten the rest, as I said,

speaker: POMPEY
text: and, as I say, paying for them very honestly—for, as

speaker: POMPEY
text: you know, Master Froth, I could not give you threepence

speaker: POMPEY
text: again—

speaker: FROTH
text: No, indeed.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Very well. You being then, if you be remembered,

speaker: POMPEY
text: cracking the stones of the foresaid prunes—

speaker: FROTH
text: Ay, so I did indeed.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Why, very well. I telling you then, if you be

speaker: POMPEY
text: remembered, that such a one and such a one were

speaker: POMPEY
text: past cure of the thing you wot of, unless they kept

speaker: POMPEY
text: very good diet, as I told you—

speaker: FROTH
text: All this is true.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Why, very well then—

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Come, you are a tedious fool. To the purpose:

speaker: ESCALUS
text: what was done to Elbow’s wife that he hath cause to

speaker: ESCALUS
text: complain of? Come me to what was done to her.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, your Honor cannot come to that yet.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: No, sir, nor I mean it not.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, but you shall come to it, by your Honor’s

speaker: POMPEY
text: leave. And I beseech you, look into Master Froth

speaker: POMPEY
text: here, sir, a man of fourscore pound a year, whose

speaker: POMPEY
text: father died at Hallowmas—was ’t not at Hallowmas,

speaker: POMPEY
text: Master Froth?

speaker: FROTH
text: All-hallond Eve.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Why, very well. I hope here be truths.—He,

speaker: POMPEY
text: sir, sitting, as I say, in a lower chair, sir—

speaker: POMPEY
text: ’Twas in the Bunch of Grapes, where indeed you

speaker: POMPEY
text: have a delight to sit, have you not?

speaker: FROTH
text: I have so, because it is an open room, and good

speaker: FROTH
text: for winter.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Why, very well then. I hope here be truths.

speaker: ANGELO
text:
This
               
              will
               
              last
               
              out
               
              a
               
              night
               
              in
               
              Russia

speaker: ANGELO
text:
When
               
              nights
               
              are
               
              longest
               
              there
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              take
               
              my
               
              leave
              ,

speaker: ANGELO
text:
And

              you
               
              to
               
              the
               
              hearing
               
              of
               
              the
               
              cause

speaker: ANGELO
text:
Hoping
               
              you’ll
               
              find
               
              good
               
              cause
               
              to
               
              whip
               
              them
               
              all
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
I
               
              think
               
              no
               
              less
              .
               
              Good
               
              morrow
               
              to
               
              your
               
              Lordship

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Now, sir, come on. What was done to Elbow’s wife,

speaker: ESCALUS
text: once more?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Once, sir? There was nothing done to her

speaker: POMPEY
text: once.

speaker: ELBOW
text: I beseech you, sir, ask him what

speaker: ELBOW
text: this man did to my wife.

speaker: POMPEY
text: I beseech your Honor, ask me.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Well, sir, what did this gentleman to her?

speaker: POMPEY
text: I beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman’s

speaker: POMPEY
text: face.—Good Master Froth, look upon his Honor.

speaker: POMPEY
text: ’Tis for a good purpose.—Doth your Honor mark

speaker: POMPEY
text: his face?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Ay, sir, very well.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Nay, I beseech you, mark it well.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Well, I do so.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Doth your Honor see any harm in his face?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Why, no.

speaker: POMPEY
text: I’ll be supposed upon a book, his face is the

speaker: POMPEY
text: worst thing about him. Good, then, if his face be the

speaker: POMPEY
text: worst thing about him, how could Master Froth do

speaker: POMPEY
text: the Constable’s wife any harm? I would know that

speaker: POMPEY
text: of your Honor.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: He’s in the right, constable. What say you to

speaker: ESCALUS
text: it?

speaker: ELBOW
text: First, an it like you, the house is a respected

speaker: ELBOW
text: house; next, this is a respected fellow, and his

speaker: ELBOW
text: mistress is a respected woman.

speaker: POMPEY
text: By this hand, sir, his wife is a more respected

speaker: POMPEY
text: person than any of us all.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicked varlet! The

speaker: ELBOW
text: time is yet to come that she was ever respected with

speaker: ELBOW
text: man, woman, or child.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Sir, she was respected with him before he

speaker: POMPEY
text: married with her.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Which is the wiser here, Justice or Iniquity?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Is this true?

speaker: ELBOW
text: O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O

speaker: ELBOW
text: thou wicked Hannibal! I respected with her before I

speaker: ELBOW
text: was married to her?—If ever I was respected with

speaker: ELBOW
text: her, or she with me, let not your Worship think me

speaker: ELBOW
text: the poor duke’s officer.—Prove this, thou wicked

speaker: ELBOW
text: Hannibal, or I’ll have mine action of batt’ry on thee.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: If he took you a box o’ th’ ear, you might have

speaker: ESCALUS
text: your action of slander too.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Marry, I thank your good Worship for it. What

speaker: ELBOW
text: is ’t your Worship’s pleasure I shall do with this

speaker: ELBOW
text: wicked caitiff?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Truly, officer, because he hath some offenses

speaker: ESCALUS
text: in him that thou wouldst discover if thou couldst,

speaker: ESCALUS
text: let him continue in his courses till thou know’st

speaker: ESCALUS
text: what they are.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Marry, I thank your Worship for it.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Thou seest, thou wicked varlet, now, what’s

speaker: ELBOW
text: come upon thee. Thou art to continue now, thou

speaker: ELBOW
text: varlet, thou art to continue.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Where were you born, friend?

speaker: FROTH
text: Here in Vienna, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Are you of fourscore pounds a year?

speaker: FROTH
text: Yes, an ’t please you, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
So.
                 
                To
                 
                Pompey
                .
               What trade are you of, sir?

speaker: POMPEY
text: A tapster, a poor widow’s tapster.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Your mistress’ name?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Mistress Overdone.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Hath she had any more than one husband?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Nine, sir. Overdone by the last.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Nine?—Come hither to me, Master Froth.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Master Froth, I would not have you acquainted with

speaker: ESCALUS
text: tapsters; they will draw you, Master Froth, and you

speaker: ESCALUS
text: will hang them. Get you gone, and let me hear no

speaker: ESCALUS
text: more of you.

speaker: FROTH
text: I thank your Worship. For mine own part, I

speaker: FROTH
text: never come into any room in a taphouse but I am

speaker: FROTH
text: drawn in.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Well, no more of it, Master Froth. Farewell.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Come you hither to me, Master Tapster. What’s your

speaker: ESCALUS
text: name, Master Tapster?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Pompey.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: What else?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Bum, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Troth, and your bum is the greatest thing

speaker: ESCALUS
text: about you, so that in the beastliest sense you are

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Pompey the Great. Pompey, you are partly a bawd,

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Pompey, howsoever you color it in being a tapster,

speaker: ESCALUS
text: are you not? Come, tell me true. It shall be the

speaker: ESCALUS
text: better for you.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Truly, sir, I am a poor fellow that would live.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: How would you live, Pompey? By being a

speaker: ESCALUS
text: bawd? What do you think of the trade, Pompey? Is it

speaker: ESCALUS
text: a lawful trade?

speaker: POMPEY
text: If the law would allow it, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: But the law will not allow it, Pompey, nor it

speaker: ESCALUS
text: shall not be allowed in Vienna.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Does your Worship mean to geld and splay all

speaker: POMPEY
text: the youth of the city?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: No, Pompey.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Truly, sir, in my poor opinion, they will to ’t

speaker: POMPEY
text: then. If your Worship will take order for the drabs

speaker: POMPEY
text: and the knaves, you need not to fear the bawds.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: There is pretty orders beginning, I can tell

speaker: ESCALUS
text: you. It is but heading and hanging.

speaker: POMPEY
text: If you head and hang all that offend that way

speaker: POMPEY
text: but for ten year together, you’ll be glad to give out a

speaker: POMPEY
text: commission for more heads. If this law hold in

speaker: POMPEY
text: Vienna ten year, I’ll rent the fairest house in it after

speaker: POMPEY
text: threepence a bay. If you live to see this come to

speaker: POMPEY
text: pass, say Pompey told you so.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Thank you, good Pompey. And in requital of

speaker: ESCALUS
text: your prophecy, hark you: I advise you let me not

speaker: ESCALUS
text: find you before me again upon any complaint

speaker: ESCALUS
text: whatsoever; no, not for dwelling where you do. If I

speaker: ESCALUS
text: do, Pompey, I shall beat you to your tent and prove

speaker: ESCALUS
text: a shrewd Caesar to you. In plain dealing, Pompey, I

speaker: ESCALUS
text: shall have you whipped. So, for this time, Pompey,

speaker: ESCALUS
text: fare you well.

speaker: POMPEY
text: I thank your Worship for your good counsel.

speaker: POMPEY
text:
Aside
                .
               But I shall follow it as the flesh and fortune

speaker: POMPEY
text: shall better determine.

speaker: POMPEY
text:
Whip
               
              me
              ?
               
              No
              ,
               
              no
              ,
               
              let
               
              carman
               
              whip
               
              his
               
              jade
              .

speaker: POMPEY
text:
The
               
              valiant
               
              heart’s
               
              not
               
              whipped
               
              out
               
              of
               
              his
               
              trade
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Come hither to me, Master Elbow. Come

speaker: ESCALUS
text: hither, Master Constable. How long have you been

speaker: ESCALUS
text: in this place of constable?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Seven year and a half, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: I thought, by the readiness in the office, you

speaker: ESCALUS
text: had continued in it some time. You say seven years

speaker: ESCALUS
text: together?

speaker: ELBOW
text: And a half, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Alas, it hath been great pains to you. They do

speaker: ESCALUS
text: you wrong to put you so oft upon ’t. Are there not

speaker: ESCALUS
text: men in your ward sufficient to serve it?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Faith, sir, few of any wit in such matters. As

speaker: ELBOW
text: they are chosen, they are glad to choose me for

speaker: ELBOW
text: them. I do it for some piece of money and go

speaker: ELBOW
text: through with all.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Look you bring me in the names of some six

speaker: ESCALUS
text: or seven, the most sufficient of your parish.

speaker: ELBOW
text: To your Worship’s house, sir?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: To my house. Fare you well.

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
To
                 
                Justice
                .
               What’s o’clock, think you?

speaker: JUSTICE
text: Eleven, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: I pray you home to dinner with me.

speaker: JUSTICE
text: I humbly thank you.

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
It
               
              grieves
               
              me
               
              for
               
              the
               
              death
               
              of
               
              Claudio
              ,

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
But
               
              there’s
               
              no
               
              remedy
              .

speaker: JUSTICE
text:
Lord
               
              Angelo
               
              is
               
              severe
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
It
               
              is
               
              but
               
              needful
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
Mercy
               
              is
               
              not
               
              itself
               
              that
               
              oft
               
              looks
               
              so
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
Pardon
               
              is
               
              still
               
              the
               
              nurse
               
              of
               
              second
               
              woe
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
But
               
              yet
              ,
               
              poor
               
              Claudio
              .
               
              There
               
              is
               
              no
               
              remedy
              .

speaker: ESCALUS
text:
Come
              ,
               
              sir
              .
